background_description: A cluster of small white flowers with prominent yellow stamens, creating a soft, textured surface. Behind the flowers, there is blurred green foliage and a thin green stem.
explanation: The insect, a beetle with a prominent black and orange/yellow patterned body, is highly visible against the white flowers and green background. Its coloration and distinct pattern create a high contrast, making it stand out rather than blend in. This suggests aposematic (warning) coloration instead of camouflage.
